column4: can anyone tell me how to install Lotus Notes client on Ubuntu using Wine?
That's easy. Get rid of Lotus Notes client and get Zimbra Open Source edition. http://www.zimbra.com/ :P
I know it works with Exchange server, not sure about Lotus notes...
might be worth a try with Zimbra, since that doesnt require Wine to run... then if it doesnt work, I'd try using Wine
